casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Mollie Elizabeth B. MCDANIEL No. 161A18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 25, 2018 Gilda C. Rodriguez, Attorney at Law, for McDaniel, Mollie Elizabeth B. Deborah Greene, Assistant Attorney General, Ted Bell, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by State of NC on the 1st of June 2018 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of June 2018."
